Australia imposes sanctions on Russian hacker over Medibank breachAustralia on Tuesday imposed cyber sanctions on a Russian man for his role in the breach at insurer Medibank , one of the country's biggest data thefts which impacted about 10 million customers. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 23:50:38 GMT Q475ETVLN5ML3NI65NJVAIB2UA https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/australia-imposes-sanctions-on- Russian-hacker-over-medibank-breach-2024-01-22/Renju Jose技术网络安全
US calls for Israel to protect innocent as forces storm Gaza hospitalThe United States on Monday called for Israel to protect innocent people in hospitals, medical staff and patients as Israeli forces stormed one hospital and put another under siege as they advanced deep into western Khan Younis in Gaza. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 23:37:17 GMT 4MHMUYQMRBN4JCU7WRDG3TGAR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-calls-israel-protect-innocent-forces-storm-gaza-hospital-2024-01-22/Bassam Masoud, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Haiti's police force shrinks amid gang crisis -unionHaiti's national police has lost nearly 3,300 officers in three years, according to data from the force's main trade union, as under-gunned security officials battle powerful gangs estimated to control most of the capital. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 23:17:40 GMT O5PNDOL5PRMTBKE3VUYPZOR2TU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitis-police-force-shrinks-amid-gang-crisis-union-2024-01-22/Reuters世界美洲
US, Britain strike underground Houthi storage site in YemenThe United States and Britain carried out an additional round of strikes on Monday against Yemen's Houthis over their targeting of Red Sea shipping, the Pentagon said, targeting an underground storage site, missiles and other Houthi military capabilities. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:45:57 GMT KPO4EDT3UVMW7KWEKZFEVZITRY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-britain-strike-underground-houthi-storage-site-yemen-2024-01-22/Reuters世界
Chinese music student faces US trial for alleged threats to activistA Chinese music student went on trial on Monday on U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:29:45 GMT ONSVBGIJGFNBFD2FAZ6PC5BY6M https://www.reuters.com/legal/chinese-music-student-faces-us-trial-alleged-threats-activist-2024-01-22/Nate Raymond合法的
Moldovan separatist leader calls for military readinessThe leader of Moldova's pro-Russian separatist Transdniestria region called on its defence and intelligence institutions on Monday to maintain a "high level of military preparedness" and hold regular drills for that purpose. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:23:25 GMT 6YRLIUUX4VK3PP7LTI6UZQJXJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldovan-separatist-leader-calls-military-readiness-2024-01-22/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
US, British forces carry out new strikes in YemenA fresh round of strikes targeted a Houthi underground storage site as well as missile and surveillance capabilities used by the Iran-aligned group. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:52:38 GMT S5TN5FFBNRI2TDGET7EFX5Z24 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-british-forces-carry-out-new-strikes-yemen-officials-2024-01-22/Reuters世界中东地区
Norman Jewison, director of 'Moonstruck,' 'In the Heat of the Night,' dies at 97Canadian film director Norman Jewison, whose eclectic array of masterpieces included the 1967 racial drama "In the Heat of the Night," the 1987 tart romantic comedy "Moonstruck" and the 1971 musical "Fiddler on the Roof," has died at the age of 97, his publicist said. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:08:41 GMT DP4JIHSVIZJR3KTBHEF2GGCOCU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/norman-jewison-director-in-heat-night-dead-97-2024-01-22/Will Dunham世界美洲
Venezuela issues arrest warrants for 14 alleged conspirators -attorney generalVenezuela's attorney general on Monday said 14 arrest warrants were issued against civilians and former military personnel for allegedly conspiring against the government of President Nicolas Maduro. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:02:58 GMT SAZVBRCBIFMD3DU4NZP7C2C2SA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-issues-arrest-warrants-14-alleged-conspirators-attorney-general-2024-01-22/Reuters世界美洲
US seeks probe into West Bank death of US teenagerThe United States on Monday called for an investigation and for accountability "as appropriate" following the West Bank death of a 17-year-old Palestinian American, who Palestinian health officials say was killed by Israeli security forces. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 19:25:38 GMT 7XJQUJOTJOGPLHR5YS2ESDBMM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-seeks-probe-into-west-bank-death-us-teenager-2024-01-22/Reuters世界
Russia's Navalny says he is forced to listen to pro-Putin singer every morningJailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny has complained of being poisoned, assaulted and deprived of proper medical care, but on Monday he disclosed he faced a new challenge: being forced to listen to a pro-Putin pop singer at 0500 every morning. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 18:57:16 GMT H7CEVBMINRMHTME6OVGG6HV6HI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-navalny-says-he-is-forced-list-sings-pro-putin-every-morning-2024-01-22/Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
